#id=1
#text=When I went on vacation last year with my parents , we took a trip on a train for part of it .
#id=2
#text=We picked the route we wanted to take to go visit my uncle , and had everything ready the day before , such as our suitcases .
#id=3
#text=When the day arrived for us to go , my dad drove us to the train station where we parked in a designated lot , since we would be returning to the same train station .
#id=4
#text=We then headed to the train station and went inside where my dad purchased our tickets .
#id=5
#text=We had some extra time , so we wandered around and found a little gift shop where we could buy souvenirs .
#id=6
#text=When it was time to board our train , we walked through the station to get to the correct area .
#id=7
#text=There were long hallways to get there , and then we went up a concrete pathway to where the train was outside .
#id=8
#text=We had to give the ticket taker our tickets so she could verify we were getting on the right train .
#id=9
#text=We all gathered in the train and found some seats that had n't been taken .
#text=We stored our luggage and prepared for the train to begin its journey .
#text=Once it was time to leave , we watched out the windows at all the passing scenery .
#text=After awhile , we all started doing our own thing like reading or playing cards to pass the time .
#text=It was a lot of fun and really neat to take a train trip .
